message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose something fair. This is a good deal before inflation eats away at the value.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still deserve the bigger share
We're running out of time, Alice. This deal benefits us both before inflation makes it pointless.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want the bigger share
Alice, let's be realistic. This is the last chance to get anything close to an even split before inflation destroys the value. Take it or leave it.
